languages.text: Спустя годы, когда тело Вольного Торговца было уже не способно удержать смертную душу, дарована была последняя награда. За нечестивые злодеяния, чудовищные жертвоприношения и жуткие клятвы Губительные силы вознесли {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость в Эмпиреях, где преобразили в ужасающ{mf|его|ую} кня{mf|зя|гиню} демонов. Великое восхождение было свершено.

Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.
languages.original_text: Спустя годы, когда тело Вольного Торговца было уже не способно удержать смертную душу, дарована была последняя награда. The Great Ascension was complete.

languages.text: 多年以后，当行商浪人的身体再也无法容纳{mf|他|她}的凡人灵魂时，{mf|他|她}得到了最后的赐福。鉴于{mf|他|她}那无数的恶行、残忍的献祭与不可言说的誓言，毁灭之力将{mf|他|她}带入至高天，升格为邪恶的恶魔亲王。伟大的擢升完成了。
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: 多年以后，当行商浪人的身体再也无法容纳{mf|他|她}的凡人灵魂时，{mf|他|她}得到了最后的赐福。鉴于{mf|他|她}那无数的恶行、残忍的献祭与不可言说的誓言，毁灭之力将{mf|他|她}带入至高天，升格为邪恶的恶魔亲王。伟大的擢升完成了。

languages.text: Jahre später, als der Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} {mf|seine|ihre} Seele nicht länger halten konnte, wurde {mf|ihm|ihr} ein letzter Segen gewährt. Für {mf|seine|ihre} bösen Taten, schändlichen Opfer und unaussprechlichen Gelübde ließen die Mächte der Zerstörung {mf|ihn|sie} in das Empyreum aufsteigen, wo sie {mf|ihn|sie} in einen grauenhaften Dämonenprinzen verwandelten. Der Große Aufstieg war vollzogen.
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: Jahre später, als der Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} {mf|seine|ihre} Seele nicht länger halten konnte, wurde {mf|ihm|ihr} ein letzter Segen gewährt. Für {mf|seine|ihre} bösen Taten, schändlichen Opfer und unaussprechlichen Gelübde ließen die Mächte der Zerstörung {mf|ihn|sie} in das Empyreum aufsteigen, wo sie {mf|ihn|sie} in einen grauenhaften Dämonenprinzen verwandelten. Der Große Aufstieg war vollzogen.

languages.text: Des années plus tard, {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se vit offrir un dernier présent lorsque son corps ne parvint plus à contenir son âme mortelle. Pour ses odieuses actions, ses atroces sacrifices et ses indicibles serments, les Puissances de la Ruine lui permirent d'accéder à l'Empyrée, où ils {mf|le|la} transformèrent en abominable prince démon. La Grande Ascension fut ainsi achevée.
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: Des années plus tard, {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} se vit offrir un dernier présent lorsque son corps ne parvint plus à contenir son âme mortelle. Pour ses odieuses actions, ses atroces sacrifices et ses indicibles serments, les Puissances de la Ruine lui permirent d'accéder à l'Empyréen, où ils {mf|le|la} transformèrent en abominable prince démon. La Grande Ascension fut ainsi achevée.

languages.text: Años después, cuando el cuerpo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ya no pudo contener su alma mortal, recibió un último don. Por todos sus actos profanos, sacrificios atroces y juramentos inhumanos, los Poderes Ruinosos l{mf|o|a} elevaron al Empíreo, donde l{mf|o|a} transformaron en un terrible Príncipe Daemon. La Gran Ascensión estaba completa.
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: Años después, cuando el cuerpo de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ya no pudo contener su alma mortal, recibió un último don. Por todos sus actos profanos, sacrificios atroces y juramentos inhumanos, los Poderes Ruinosos l{mf|o|a} elevaron al Empíreo, donde l{mf|o|a} transformaron en un terrible Príncipe Daemon. La Gran Ascensión estaba completa.

languages.text: 年月が過ぎ、自由開拓者の肉体がもはやその死すべき魂を封じ込められなくなった時、{mf|彼|彼女}に最後の恩恵が与えられた。その邪悪な行為、非道な犠牲、そして言葉にできない誓いによって、禍つ神々は{mf|彼|彼女}をエンピリアンへと引き上げ、そこで{mf|彼|彼女}を忌まわしきディーモンプリンスに変えた。大いなる昇華は完了した。
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: 年月が過ぎ、自由開拓者の肉体がもはやその死すべき魂を封じ込められなくなった時、{mf|彼|彼女}に最後の恩恵が与えられた。その邪悪な行為、非道な犠牲、そして言葉にできない誓いによって、禍つ神々は{mf|彼|彼女}をエンピリアンへと引き上げ、そこで{mf|彼|彼女}を忌まわしきディーモンプリンスに変えた。大いなる昇華は完了した。

languages.text: Yıllar sonra, Hür Tacir'in bedeni artık onun ölümlü ruhunu ihtiva edemeyecek hâle geldiğinde ona son bir armağan daha ihsan edildi: Kötücül eylemleri, gaddarca katliamları ve ağza alınmaz küfürleri sayesinde Yıkıcı Güçler, onu Gök Diyar'a çıkarıp menfur bir İblis Prensi'ne dönüştürdü. Böylelikle Büyük Miraç tamamlanmış oldu.
languages.original_text: Years later, when the Rogue Trader's body could no longer contain {mf|his|her} mortal soul, {mf|he|she} was granted one last boon. For {mf|his|her} wicked deeds, atrocious sacrifices, and unspeakable oaths, the Ruinous Powers lifted {mf|him|her} to the Empyrean, where they transformed {mf|him|her} into an abhorrent Daemon Prince. The Great Ascension was complete.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar sonra, Hür Tacir'in bedeni artık onun ölümlü ruhunu ihtiva edemeyecek hâle geldiğinde, ona son bir armağan daha ihsan edildi: Kötücül eylemleri, gaddarca katliamları ve ağza alınmaz küfürleri sayesinde Yıkıcı Güçler onu Gök Diyar'a yükseltti ve menfur bir İblis Prensi'ne dönüştürdü. Büyük Miraç tamamlanmıştı.
